name: Everybody Out!
description:
Thomas is hosting the biggest party of the year. But danger lurks within...

...he has an "intestinal emergency", and he can't use the toilet if anyone is around. He needs to be alone, but the music is too loud, his friends can't hear him. Will Thomas be the hero when he hears the calling? Will there be poop jokes that only a nine year old would laugh?

Made for the Brackeys Game Jam 2.2022
